channel.title: How to make a npc trade?
channel.description:
Hello moparscape! How to make a "NPC" when you click on "Talk" so it trade?
,Thanks. I D D S I

item.title: How to make a npc trade?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“I D D S I, post:3, topic:266076”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=351298.msg2697306#msg2697306 date=1236374783]
make the shop, add into your client.java?

if you search for this it will give u the rest of the codes and what to search. im not spoon feeding sorry.

there is also a tut in the tut section with this in on page 1 or 2.
[/quote]

What to add in client.java ?

  • There is not a tut in tut section. Mabye it was 1 but it was LOCKED *[/quote]

IT IS NOT FUCKING LOCKED! LOOK THROUGH.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a npc trade?
